General.Name: Ramayana Lestari Sentosa Tbk
General.Description: PT Ramayana Lestari Sentosa Tbk operates a chain of department stores in Indonesia. It sells clothes, accessories, bags, shoes, cosmetics, and daily needs, as well as food products through the company's stores and supermarkets. The company also offers products online through ramayana.co.id. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Ramayana Lestari Sentosa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Ramayana Makmursentosa.
General.Address: Jln. KH. Wahid Hasyim No. 220 A-B, Jakarta, Indonesia, 10250
